This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Black triangle with a light on each corner, rear lights blinked, light in middle on bottom was red.
divs: Sighting DetailsBlack triangle about 1000 feet in the sky flew right over me on highway 50 right before the Capital City freeway exit. It was flying in a southeast direction. Flight was slow, and in a straight path. When it was directly overhead I stuck my head out of my window and saw it against the night sky. Perfect triangle shape. One white light on each corner, a red light in the middle. The rear two lights blinked in a non random pattern, the rest of the lights were non blinking. Attached is a quick illustration of what I saw. My opinion is that it was a military blimp type object. It had no regular FAA anti collision lighting configuration.
